instruction: Analyze the performance of the MSCI climate indexes this year, including the impact of higher oil prices, inflation, commodity prices, and rising interest rates. Compare the underperformance of the MSCI ACWI Climate Change and MSCI ACWI Climate Paris Aligned Indexes to the MSCI ACWI Low Carbon Leaders and MSCI ACWI Low Carbon Target Indexes.
output: The MSCI climate indexes have experienced negative performance this year due to several macroeconomic impacts, including higher oil prices, inflation, commodity prices, and rising interest rates. As a result, the MSCI ACWI Climate Change and MSCI ACWI Climate Paris Aligned Indexes underperformed compared to the MSCI ACWI Low Carbon Leaders and MSCI ACWI Low Carbon Target Indexes. While all indexes underperformed the MSCI ACWI Index, the Low Carbon Leaders and Low Carbon Target Indexes had lower tracking error, resulting in less significant underperformance compared to the climate indexes. Therefore, it is important to focus on the latter two indexes for further analysis.
